long_description: Indulge in a hand-crafted chuao Gourmet chocolate bar and you won't regret it. These all-natural bars feature intriguing flavor combinations that are sure to arouse your taste buds. Maple Bacon/Milk chocolate flavor combines the goodness of crispy bacon with a splash of sweet maple syrup and a bit of bonfire-smoked sea salt. Firecracker/Dark chocolate flavor sizzles with smoky chipotle and a sprinkling of sea salt right before popping candy explodes and starts a party in your mouth. Potato Chip/Milk chocolate flavor combines creamy milk chocolate, a sprinkle of sea salt and that irresistible potato chip crunch. Salted Crunch/Dark chocolate flavor features deep chocolate notes, crispy breadcrumbs and a kiss of sea salt. chuao Gourmet chocolate bars contain no hydrogenated fats, artificial preservatives, artificial colors, artificial flavors or artificial sweeteners. All flavors may contain nuts, seeds or nut/seed residue as well as trace amounts of dairy. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Indulge in a hand-crafted chuao Gourmet chocolate bar and you won't regret it. These all-natural bars feature intriguing flavor combinations that are sure to arouse your taste buds.
